howToConvert.title: How to convert a PPTX to PDF file
howToConvert.description: We made our file converter to be as easy to use as possible. Converting your PPTX to a PDF document involves three steps:

steps.description: Upload your PPTX: Click upload to choose a file from your computer, or drag your file into the dropzone above.
Click 'Convert to PDF': This converts your file from PPTX to PDF.
Download your document: Your download will start automatically, or you can click to download your file.

whyConvert.title: Why convert PPTX to PDF files
paragraphs: You may need a free PPTX to PDF download to make changes to a document in one simple step. PDFs typically preserve their original formatting, meaning making changes to the document would require multiple downloads, checking, and editing.

This PPTX converter will quickly change your PPTX to a PDF file, allowing for easier accessibility for others to collaborate and edit the document. Once you download your Word file, you can easily manipulate text, images, and the structure of the content to prepare it for the final draft.
